snippet: Federal lawmakers are wary of voters’ scrutiny as the November election approaches, but in Texas, where seats are decided largely during primaries, officeholders can get to work.
lead_paragraph: Federal lawmakers are wary of voters’ scrutiny as the November election approaches, but in Texas, where seats are decided largely during primaries, officeholders can get to work.

headline.main: Freedom to Act as Election Year Draws to Close
headline.print_headline: Freedom to Act as Election Year Draws to Close
